vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Midianites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.4;
son of: Midian (H4080);
brother of: Ephah (H5891), Hanoch (H2585I), Abida (H0028) and Eldaah (H0420)
§ Epher = "a calf"
1) the 2nd son of Midian
2) a son of Ezra, among the descendants of Judah
3) one of the heads of the families of Manasseh on the east of the Jordan
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Madián, hijo de Queturá, esposa de Abraham; (b)   hijo de Esdras; tribu de Judá; (c)   jefe de familia; tribu de Manasés
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以弗 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "小牛"
1) 米甸的第二個兒子(創 25:4)(代上 1:33)
2) 猶大的後裔以斯拉的兒子 (代上 4:17)
3) 約旦東邊的瑪拿西支派的一位族長 (代上 5:24)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以弗 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "小牛"
1) 米甸的第二个儿子(创 25:4)(代上 1:33)
2) 犹大的后裔以斯拉的儿子 (代上 4:17)
3) 约旦东边的玛拿西支派的一位族长 (代上 5:24)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.17;
son of: Ezrah (H5834);
brother of: Jether (H3500J), Mered (H4778) and Jalon (H3210)
§ Epher = "a calf"
1) the 2nd son of Midian
2) a son of Ezra, among the descendants of Judah
3) one of the heads of the families of Manasseh on the east of the Jordan

A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.24
§ Epher = "a calf"
1) the 2nd son of Midian
2) a son of Ezra, among the descendants of Judah
3) one of the heads of the families of Manasseh on the east of the Jordan
